ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6.9 ounce) package chicken flavored rice mix (such as Rice A RoniÂ®)

cookingTips: Brown the ground beef thoroughly before adding rice mix
Toast the rice mix briefly to enhance its flavor before adding liquid
Stir occasionally and let liquid absorb fully for fluffy rice
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the user the quick method of creating a complete meal using flavored rice mixes, and explain the importance of browning beef for depth.
